alert.note: Alert for Colfax (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:19PM MDT until June 11 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL COLFAX COUNTY... At 519 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raton Crews Airport, or 15 miles south of Raton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Raton Crews Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 431 and 443. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 333 and 340, and between Mile Markers 358 and 362. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
